title: Patch Notes
content: xed the Common and Reactions tabs of the Character Sheet missing for recently recruited companions. Made sure the quest objectives that appear during gameplay for certain quests are updated properly on some older saves. Adjusted the spacing in the Reactions UI to make resource costs a little clearer.
